question: Which Union Ministry implements PM SVANidhi (PM Street Vendor’s AtmaNirbhar Nidhi) scheme?
option4: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers welfare
explanation:
Ministry of Housing & Urban Affairs is implementing the PM SVANidhi (PM Street Vendor’s AtmaNirbhar Nidhi) scheme.
PM SVANidhi was launched by the government on June 1, 2020, to provide working capital loan to street vendors. Recently, the Ministry has launched a mobile application of PM SVANidhi scheme, in a virtual event from New Delhi.
